control.visible: [String.Contains(ListItem.DBType,artist) + Skin.HasSetting(multi_mv)] | String.Contains(ListItem.DBType,actor) | String.Contains(ListItem.DBType,director) | String.Contains(ListItem.DBType,studio) | String.Contains(ListItem.DBType,tag) | [[String.Contains(ListItem.DBType,genre) | Container.Content(years)] + String.Contains(Container.FolderPath,videodb)] + !String.StartsWith(ListItem.Label,..)
